name: Bow Trick Shot
description:
Welcome to Bow Trick Shot - a balloon popping game Instructions for play: 
  • Move with WASD
  • Aim the bow with the mouse
  • Hold the left mouse button to draw
    - hold longer for more power 
  • You can retrieve arrows if you get there fast enough
  • Hit as many balloons as you can with 20 arrows to get the high score!
